name: policypilot
description: AI-powered insurance policy assistant with FastAPI backend and React frontend

scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.api:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.backend:install: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.backend:test: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest
